text:
[Verse]
Umbrella in the air
No care in my stare
Raindrops falling down
Spinning all around

[Verse 2]
Puddles at my feet
Rhythm
Can you feel the beat
Splashing in my shoes
Got nothing to lose

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Joy without the pain
Laughing in the storm
Keeps my spirit warm

[Verse 3]
Clouds they hide the sun
But we still have fun
Lightning in the night
Grooving to the light

[Bridge]
In this gray we find
Peace inside our mind
Every drop a song
Makes us feel so strong

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Joy without the pain
Laughing in the storm
Keeps my spirit warm
title: Dancing in the Rain
